patterns: How can i find out more about the District's Spanish Immersion program?
responses: Currently there are three school participating in the Spanish Immersion program, Puesta del Sol Elementary, Tillicum Middle School, and Newport high school, you can contact any of the to learn more

patterns: Do you have Career and Technical Education programs?
responses: Yes we do offer CTE classes, to get more info contact the CTE office at 425-456-4181

patterns: Does the district offer driver training
Does the district have a program to assist students who are English-as-a-Second-Language Learners?
is there program for english as second language learners?
does district offer english second language program
responses: ESL/ELL classes are offered at a number of our schools.  For more information, contact our ELL Program Office at 425-456-4135 or visit https://bsd405.org/services/english-language-learners/

patterns: How can i find out more about the Gifted Program?
How to get into gifted program
responses: You can call the Gifted Education office at 425-456-4136 or visit https://bsd405.org/2018/08/gifted-program-becomes-advanced-learning-services/ for more information

patterns: How do I find out more about the International Baccalaureate (IB) Program?
how to get into International Baccalaureate program
how to get into IB program
responses: Visit the Interlake High School website for more information: https://bsd405.org/interlake/
Contact Interlake High School at https://bsd405.org/interlake/
